title: All Mortal Greatness
description: In All Mortal Greatness, the stand-alone Book III of the Sessions University Series, a new academic year has begun.Thomas Simpson, the former director of communications, is now the new executive director at the Mark Berger Foundation. Berger, a multi-billionaire alumnus, has been appointed as the new chairman of the board of trustees and Zoltan Vastag, Thomas's best friend, continues his cancer research at the medical center.Just as everything seems to be returning to normal from the last three years of life-threatening intrigue, a prominent member of the university administration is murdered on his walk home along the campus drive.Thomas, Berger and Zoltan must join forces again to solve the mystery of this unwarranted murder.
author: Nelson Cover
